Klasse Flight

java.lang.Object
Flight
public class Flight extends Object
Flight class represents a flight with passengers

  • Methodendetails

    • removePassenger

      public boolean removePassenger(int id)
      Removes a passenger from the flight
      Parameter:
      id - The ID of the passenger to remove
      Gibt zurück:
      True if the passenger was removed, false if the ID is invalid

      Adds a new passenger to the flight
      Parameter:
      passenger - The passenger to add
